completions.nl_description: Recolor all columns directly adjacent to red columns to yellow.
Recolor all objects adjacent to objects of color R to color Y.
Extend all objects of color R one step to the right and recolor the extended parts to color Y.
Extend all objects of color R to the right, keeping the original color.
For each group of 3 consecutive 'R' objects in a row, ensure there's 'Y' objects between them while moving 'Y' objects within the row.
Extend the objects of color R, by adding color Y until they meet another object with color R
Extend rightmost 'R' objects till edge with a trail of 'Y' while avoiding overlap
Change the color of all objects of color R that are neighbors of exactly two objects of color R, to color Y.
Extend all horizontal lines of Rs with Ys until the end of the row, intersecting other objects.
Transform the color of the middle neighboring cells of each R object to Y.
Change the color of objects that are diagonal neighbors of R to Y.
Recolor the objects with the letter 'R' to 'Y' in the rows where they appear.
Extend all the vertically aligned objects of color R towards the rightmost object on their respective rows, without overlapping.
Extend all objects of size 1 towards the rightmost object of color R, without overlapping.
Recolor cells adjacent to all objects of color R to color Y.
Extend all objects of color R by one cell in all directions towards connected nodes, changing the new cells to color Y
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node_max down_left)
            (move_node_max down)
            (move_node_max down_right)
            (move_node_max up_left)
            (move_node_max up)
            (move_node_max up_right)
            (move_node_max left)
            (move_node_max right)
            (update_color Y)
        )    
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor the row-neighboring cells of each object of color R to color Y.

Extend all R objects toward the right until they hit another object, and then recolor them to color Y.

Extend red colored objects along the row towards other red colored objects, without overlapping.
Extend the left part of each vertical line of size 3, and recolor it to Y.
Extend nodes of red color horizontally to the right.
Recolor all R objects forming a slash-based diagonal of size 4 to color Y.
Extend all objects of color R towards the closest neighboring object vertically.
Extend all the vertical objects of color R by 2 steps downward and recolor those extended segments to color Y.

Extend objects of color R in the direction of the object of color R if they are neighbors, without overlapping.
For all objects of color 'R', except the rightmost one, extend them one step to the right and change the extended part to color 'Y'.
Extend the objects of color R in the right direction until they hit another object, and recolor them to color Y.
Extend all objects of color R to the right by two cells, changing those cells to color Y.
Recolor all cells that form a line extending from 'R' in each column to 'Y' except the cells already colored 'R'.
Recolor all objects of size 1 in the center row to color Y from the right side only.
Recolor all objects of size 1, adjacent to the objects of size 3, to color Y
Recolor all objects to color Y, except objects of color R.
Extend all objects of color R in the right direction, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects of color R to a line of color Y.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        )
        (apply
            (move_node down)
            (move_node down)
            (move_node down)
            (update_color Y)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Extend all objects of color R in the right direction without overlap, and then update their color to Y.
Recolor all R objects of size 1 that are neighbors with two other R objects to color Y.
Extend the objects of color R towards right, without overlapping, if they are neighbors to each other.
Extend all objects of color 'R' to the right while overlapping.
Extend all 'R' objects without overlapping to form a horizontal line
Recolor all occurrences of the smallest object with color Y and move the neighboring elements of column Y to match the right-side elements once moved.
Extend to the right and recolor to yellow all the red 'stair' shaped objects on the grid
Move all objects of color R of size 1 one step to the right, then recolor objects of size 4 to color Y.
Extend all the objects of color R towards direction right, without overlapping, then change their color to Y.
Move all objects of color R to the right until they hit another object, then recolor them to Y.
Extend the first object in each row towards the last object in the row, up to 2 cells, and recolor the extended parts to color Y.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter)
        (apply
            (extend_node right false)
            (extend_node right false)
            (update_color Y)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Extend objects of color R to the right with color Y without overlapping.
Extend all objects of color R with size 1 horizontally without overlapping.
Change color to Y for objects adjacent to object of color R in upright diagonal direction.
Recolor objects adjacent to red objects to color Y, only if they are on the right side.
Extend the object of color Y to the right until it hits the object of color R or the edge of the grid.
Change the objects neighboring color R to Y and then move them towards the upper-left corner until they hit the object of color R
Extend all red 'R' objects to the right without overlapping.
Recolor all objects neighboring a red object to yellow.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of other) R) (neighbor_of this other))) (apply (update_color Y))))

completions.nl_description: Extend all 'R' objects to the right three steps, overlapping.
Recolor all objects immediately below and to the right of the object of color R to color Y.
Extend the objects of color R in direction right without overlapping with another object.
Color blue all the neighbours of the red object.
Move each contiguous line of 'R' objects in each row three steps to the right if 'R' is in the first column, and update their color to 'Y'.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter
            (and
                (color_equals (color_of this) R)
                (column_equals (column_of this) 0)
            )
        )
        (apply
            (move_node right)
            (move_node right)
            (move_node right)
            (update_color Y)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Extend all Red objects horizontally to the right, changing their color to Yellow.
Extend all objects of size 2 towards the object of color R, without overlapping.

completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter (and (color_equals (color_of this) R) (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) R))))
        (apply (update_color Y))
    )
)
